page.title: 19Transport
page.content: A main railway line runs through the area linking Sheffield with Midland counties.The nearest station with access to passenger routes is Chesterfield where there is a rapid service to London.Barrow Hill used to have a station but it was closed in the first set of Beeching cuts.There is an extensive network of sidings, branch lines and mineral railways constructed to serve the industrial needs of the area.There is a large amount of goods traffic running through the area.There is a good bus service with frequent links to Chesterfield,hourly buses to Sheffield and an adequate service to Staveley where there are good links with other services.
